Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.Table_Top_Gaming.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the information that each player will need, including points, resources, picture, name, etc.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Retrieves the player name, which should already be set.

      • canDraw

        public boolean canDraw()
        Indicates whether the player is able to draw a card. A player cannot draw a card if the deck is empty.
        Returns:
        True if player can draw a card. Otherwise false.
